content.rendered:
A stunning 12 year-old blend from Hibiki, some of the whisky has been part-matured in plum liqueur casks. Along with grain from Chita and malt from Yamazaki the Hibiki blend uses some whisky matured in plum wine casks in the mix.
The Japanese blend picked up the top prize in its category at the World Whisky Awards 2010.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery Hibiki
Age 12 Year Old
Whisky Origin Japan
Region Japan
ABV 43%
Bottle Size 50cl
